title: _GET_PED_EYE_COLOR
content:
0x76BBA2CEE66D47E9// GetPedEyeColor
int _GET_PED_EYE_COLOR(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: Returns ped's eye colour, or -1 if fails to get.A getter for _SET_PED_EYE_COLOR.Examples:Lualocal pedEyeColour = N_0x76bba2cee66d47e9(PlayerPedId())
if pedEyeColour == 7 then
  print("Gray eyes!")
end
codeBlocks:
local pedEyeColour = N_0x76bba2cee66d47e9(PlayerPedId())
if pedEyeColour == 7 then
end
